originalText.text:
Commercial Systems Experts is by far the best ever (And I have worked with more than handful of companies in The District). I always look for companies that have great services and integrity. I hit the jackpot with Commercial Systems Experts. From my first meeting with James, to the pros at the office who plan and support, I'm confident I'm in good hands! The value for the services is amazing. The customer service is impeccable. The knowledge of security is top notch.
I'm truly honored and blessed to be a customer!  You cannot go wrong with Commercial Systems Experts, unless you don't use them! You'll be happy you chose them!!!
Thank you for a great service, and for making our store safer.

originalText.text:
We recently moved to Chelsea and wanted a comprehensive security system installed in our new house.  We received proposals from 4 separate security firms operating in Chelsea and Commercial Security Experts and Seth stood out among all of the competition in terms of professionalism and expertise (Although not the cheapest option we had).
Seth was very impressive in his quick response and in explaining the security options available to us.  We spoke with his central monitoring partner as part of the qualification process to validate Commercial Security Experts’ service levels as well.
I would highly recommend Seth and his team to anyone seeking a high-quality security solution in Chelsea and seeking a high-level of professional service and expertise.

originalText.text: Little late but the service I got from Commercial Security Systems Experts worth a review at any time. I've been meaning to write a review here for months and time has just gotten away from me!  Conner was FANTASTIC to work with and we love our new security system he installed. We have been using it for several months and it is amazing. Mobile app to turn the alarm on and off from your IPhone, they called us when our smoke alarm went off when cooking Smokey breakfast one Sunday morning. We love our system. Conner was so great at communicating our various options and very fair in price. He was quick to make any necessary tweaks for us as well and never charged a fee for making an extra house call during our initial setup. We would highly recommend Commercial Security Systems Experts to anyone in the Astoria area. Thanks again, Conner!

originalText.text:
After talking to many different home security companies in Soho I gave Commercial Security Experts a call.  They answered all of my questions and was able to get a sales representative out to my house that afternoon.  The sales rep showed up on time.  He asked me what I thought I needed and recommended that one additional door that I had not considered.  Dave explained how the equipment worked and suggested that if I wanted extra sensors they would charge me the same price I would pay online. No up-selling.   Commercial Security Experts were able to install the system the next day and showed up at the front end of the two hour window they gave me.  The installer was professional and installed the equipment efficiently and the system works.
The equipment is super easy to use.  I like the touch pad and would go with Commercial Security Experts again.

originalText.text:
I finally moved to Chelsea and contacted a few companies for an alarm and home automation system. Out of all the companies, Nathan at Commercial Security Experts offered the best service, quick response time for an appointment and offered all the options I wanted.
He visited my new home on Wednesday and the system was installed on Saturday! Super-fast service! Our installer Nathan was awesome. Nathan did a great job installing and knew exactly what they were doing. I am very pleased with Commercial Security Experts and will absolutely recommend their service. I'm normally not a review writer, but I'm very happy and wanted to share my experience.
P.S Take the newest intercom system with the Video option, you will thank me later.
